description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
What's Changed
- Guard macOS exe path loop by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1457
- Prevent process stubs from breaking Windows test runner by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1458
- Stabilize install app integration test assertion by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1459
- Fix Playwright HTML report output path by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1460
- Fix ToDesktop workflows and drop staging by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1462
- chore: format todesktop action whitespace by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1467
- Update ComfyUI core to v0.4.0 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1466
- Remove codecov references by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1468
- Prepare manager pip support by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1450
- v0.6.0 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1469
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.5.12...v0.6.0
